ing: 2 large red bell peppers, sliced into rings
1 large sweet onion, peeled and chopped
des: "This dish is a classic: Easy, filling, and very tasty!  I served it as a side with grilled shrimp and corn on the cob and it was a huge hit.  Would also be good at breakfast instead of hash browns."
ins: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat.  Fry the potatoes for 5 minutes, then add the peppers and onions.  Season with salt and pepper.  Cook for at least 15 minutes, turning potatoes frequently, or until potatoes start to look mushy.
